item.title: CSE 385 Database
item.description: 2021-01-28 Create a Table CREATE TABLE dbo.tblFriends( friendId INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY, firstName VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, lastName VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, age INT NOT NULL DEFAULT(-1), phoneNumber VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT('(***) ***-****'), [address] VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT(NULL) ); Version 1: Creates many transactions INSERT INTO tblFriends (firstName, lastName, age, phoneNumber, [address]) VALUES('A', 'A', 22, 'A', 'A') INSERT INTO tblFriends (firstName, lastName, age, phoneNumber) VALUES ('B', 'B', 22, 'B') INSERT INTO tblFriends (firstName, lastName, age) VALUES ('C', 'C', 22) INSERT INTO tblFriends (firstName, lastName) VALUES ('D', 'D') /* INSERT INTO tblFriends (firstName)VALUES ('E') Cannot insert the value NULL into column 'lastName', table 'Example.
